text: House Speaker Mike Johnson survives challenge from Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene  —  Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) officially filed her motion Monday to oust Speaker Mike Johnson (R-La.) as leader of the House, starting a two-day clock for lawmakers to decide his fate.
